name: TOGETHER VR
description: Come! Indulge yourselves in your own private den and create sweet and loving memories with her!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required.
